title: Interpretation of sesame in a dream: Seeing sesame in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of sesame, whether white or black, is eating, buying and grinding corn and grains for single women, married women and pregnant women, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and al-Nabulsi. Seeing sesame seeds in a dream Sesame is a permissible food in a dream, in addition to its juice, its saddle, the money of honor and power, as well as all other grains. Whoever dreams of planting sesame will gain power, trade, asceticism, profit, and joy. It has been said that sesame and mustard are only beneficial to doctors, but to others they are considered evidence of illness. Whoever sees sesame will be harmed because it is a frequent poison. The symbol of sesame in a dream: food and money are permissible, and whoever sees that he is planting sesame his livelihood will increase. This vision indicates the achievement of goodness, happiness, good progress in the work of the one who has the vision, and the blessing of entering the home and living legitimately. Whoever sees sesame seeds in a dream will have great luck in this world. You will fill the house with the best foods. It shows that the visionary has gone through some problems and experiences due to common problems or problems in his life, and therefore he will be very sad and feel tired and stressed, but he will be able to move to another house after a while, see opportunities and other ways of working, he will deal with it in a way Completely different from what it was in the past and this will comfort him a lot. Due to the good work and projects he has achieved, he will be able to reach high positions, and thanks to his high skills and potential, he will attract a lot of attention and obtain a good employment contract from major companies, and thus he will receive an amount A large amount of money will not be obtained before. Seeing that you are eating sesame in a dream. The person who sees this vision will have great luck and the owner of the vision will appreciate all the actions that come before him without saying much or little and without saying big or small. Thanks to this, the owner of this The vision will appreciate his own business. Buying sesame seeds in a dream This vision indicates that its owner will enter into ways that will not benefit him, just to obtain money to pay off debts that he cannot pay. Seeing sesame bread After going through bad events and periods, he will be able to overcome them all and live a happy and fulfilling life. This vision indicates a person to whom you feel loyal and that you feel that this person has value to you. Seeing a sesame flower in a dream Insightful you will experience developments and events that will make him happy and comfortable, his fears will go away, and you will live a peaceful life. Collecting sesame seeds in a dream This vision shows wealthy people and your money will increase thanks to Wise investments that you will make. Interpretation of a dream about sesame for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees sesame in a dream may have many good things appear in the vision, but if she sees that she is getting a plate of sesame and only sees it and will not eat it, and someone else takes the plate of sesame from the front. . She is eating all the sesame, the vision may indicate a strong relationship between the girl and the person who is eating from the plate. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating a lot of toasted sesame seeds, then she will have good skin with a lot of kindness and food and the fulfillment of many desires and goals.

title: Interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream by Ibn Sirin The sun, the moons, and the processions are among the wonders that God created in this universe, and which scientists have tried for decades to uncover and discover the elaborate system with which they were created. One of the most mysterious dreams are dreams related to the sun and stars, especially when they are repeated. And the dreamer has many times in different ways during the night, and there are many interpretations mentioned in the books of the great imams of interpretation. In this article we will learn about Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream.Interpretation of seeing two suns in a dreamThe sun in a dream means a bright future, especially if that sun makes you feel warm. And rest. This dream means that the dreamer will be in a high position, and will have influence and power that will make him serve the people. Therefore, seeing the sun can be a new success that you will achieve in your work and then you will get the appropriate promotion. As for seeing two suns in the daytime sky, this It means that the dreamer has one of the options that will turn his life upside down. That is, he is lost and cannot choose, but this dream is evidence that both options are good. But he must choose the best for himself with sound thinking and organized planning, but at the same time. The sleeper dreams in his dream that he In front of Shamsin and with him is a friend, which convinces him that it is normal. This is evidence of a conspiracy by this friend and he is planning to deceive you for things that are not true. This is either because he wants you to fall into evil or conspiracy, or he made a mistake in the past and does not want you to know about it. As for the interpretation of the vision Two suns in a dream. Their appearance in the sky erases darkness and obscurity. They are a source of light, so this is evidence that the dreamer is in distress, perhaps related to financial matters. Either he is sick or waiting for something he longs for, so here the two suns mean the solace that comes after distress, but the dreamer will receive More than he wants, and this also means seeing. That there is a lot of joy and happiness that will come to the dreamer after a long period of sadness and anxiety. If the sleeper sees that the sun is rising at night, this is evidence of his deception and he has made a lot of effort. To prove the things of a mirage. Why not It benefits him and does not bring him good. Here the person must recalculate. And start seeing things with a realistic vision and not as he wants them, because the interpretation of seeing two suns in a dream. Those that shine at night are also an indication of the problems that a person can put on himself. Because of his wrong thinking and things. Which he was convinced of, and it is neither true nor valid. Here the divine must be alert and flexible in thinking, so as not to see himself in a major dilemma from which he cannot get out. Seeing more than one sun in a red dream, this indicates the emergence of many problems in the dreamerâ€™s life. These problems will not make his life the same and may be the reason why he will lose many people. And if a man or woman sees that they are on Hajj, and while circumambulating the Kaaba, two or more suns will shine in the sky. This is evidence of the divine morals that the dreamer possesses and that he has a great mind. Maybe this is a reason to open all closed doors, and have faith

title: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife giving birth to a child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of having a child from my ex-wife in a dream Next we will give the interpretation of the dream that I have a child from my ex-wife in a dream, as it can have different meanings and other details.Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife giving birth to a child in a dreamHowever, a divorced womanâ€™s vision of her ex-husband giving birth to a child It may lead to her love for him, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband giving birth to her child, it may indicate her return, and God knows best. Whereas if a divorced woman sees the birth of a son from your ex-husband, this may lead to problems and difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband trying to please me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams For my ex-husband trying to please me in a dream, it may be a sign of paying off his debts, and God knows the unseen. If I see my ex-husband trying to please me in a dream, it may be a sign of happiness, and God knows all that is not seen. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband in a dream, it may be a sign that she is thinking In it, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a divorced woman trying to console her may indicate getting rid of sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife without a hijab in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife without a hijab in a dream could be a sign of revealing secrets. Just as seeing my ex-wife without a hijab in a dream could be a sign of revealing secrets. Without a hijab, it may indicate her greed, and God knows best. When you see my ex-wife without a hijab in a dream, this may be a sign that I am marrying her again, and God knows best. If a divorced woman is seen without a hijab, this may be evidence of bad deeds, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wifeâ€™s brother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing My ex-wifeâ€™s brother in a dream could be a sign of solving problems, and God knows best, as the vision of your ex-wifeâ€™s brother may express goodness and justice, and God knows the unseen, and if the dreamer sees his ex-wifeâ€™s brother, this may lead to a return, and God knows best. If a man sees his ex-wifeâ€™s brother beating him, he can express About the good that he receives from him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a divorced father in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a divorced father in a dream could be a sign of solving problems, God willing. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husbandâ€™s father in a dream, this may be evidence of stability, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a father My ex-wife in a dream, this may be a sign of returning, and God knows best. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees her ex-husbandâ€™s father angry, this may lead to bad relations, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wifeâ€™s sister in a dream. If a man sees my ex-wifeâ€™s sister in a dream, it may be a sign of a return, and God knows the unseen. When a man sees my ex-wifeâ€™s sister in a dream, it could be a sign of justice, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation The dream of my ex-wife talking to me in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing the name Salman in a dream according to Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the name Salman in a dream According to Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation, the name Suleiman is one of the ancient Arabic names known to the Arabs, as it is the name of one of the prophets who were sent and there are many stories. It was mentioned about him in the Holy Qurâ€™an, so seeing the name Suleiman in a dream is considered one of the beautiful and promising dreams of goodness, and this indicates that the dreamer is religious and is interested in reading prophetic stories and learning from them. In the article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the name Salman in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the name in a dream Interpretation by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin is a great follower, jurist in the science of hadith and interpretation, and a pioneer in the science of dream interpretation. God is good and God knows best. The dreamerâ€™s vision of one of the names that have beautiful meanings, such as faith, sincerity, majesty, generous, interpretation according to the meaning, the meaning is beautiful, the vision is praiseworthy, and if the meaning is not good, then dreaming of it is an evil omen for the fortune teller with the meaning and God knows best. Vision The name Salman in a dream indicates the dreamerâ€™s safety from an evil that he could have been exposed to, but God saved him and saved him from it. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the name Salman in a dream: Seeing him in a dream indicates good and great livelihood for the dreamer in the coming period, because this goodness has a relationship to his professional and personal life. And God knows best. It indicates the condition of the dreamer and his good personality, and that he is a religious person with good conduct and behavior among those around him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the name Salman in a dream is good news for an answer to the supplication that the dreamer was pleading with God Almighty and that God accepts his prayers and grants his wish by His command. His vision is considered One of the most benign visions that bring goodness and happiness to the pioneer. Seeing it written in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is going through a new experience in his life from which he will gain goodness and profit and change his situation for the better. Many names appear in dreams for different reasons. Each of these names has meanings. It has different connotations from other names, and may be related to names that the fortuneteller heard or knew about a person with these names, so they remained stuck in his mind.

title: Interpretation of an incense box in a dream: Seeing incense in a dream

preview.html: Dream of incense for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, to buy the scent of incense, and to give a gift of incense to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of incense in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says that seeing incense in a dream means religion, knowledge, and a good life, but if one sees incense smoke in his dream or smells incense, the vision may indicate that he hears a lot of good news, but if a person sees that he is burning incense in a dream, he can. And when a person sees in his dream a piece of incense in his house, God will bless him with a newborn soon, while seeing the fortune teller smoking his house may indicate seeing a good woman because she dictates a lot to the house. Good, while seeing black incense can indicate the arrival of happy news, good news, good events, the end of troubles, and the release of anxiety. Incense shows your good behavior among people Incense: Speaking in praise of oneself Interpretation of incense in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees incense in her dream, the vision may show the morals and good reputation she enjoys, and the vision also shows many good words that happen to her, but if she sees that she is lighting an incense stick or smelling it, this is good news for achieving the desires, goals and ambitions that she wants to achieve, and this vision indicates a close marriage with a reliable man with high morals. Interpretation of incense in a dream for a man When an unmarried young man sees incense in a dream, the vision may indicate a close marriage to a girl with good morals and religion, and she is righteous, and he will be happy with her throughout his life. If a married man sees incense, the vision may indicate good conditions and good morals, and it is a sign that his wife will soon become pregnant and that God Almighty will bless the newborn. Interpretation of incense in a dream for a married woman A married woman who dreams of incense may see the vision of faith and piety, but if she sees incense burning or burning, it is good to hear good news, good news and joy. Also, seeing incense for a married woman shows the good conditions of her husband and that God will provide him with many good things and provisions in abundance and a lot of money, while seeing the smell of fragrant incense can indicate the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations that the dreamer wants. Thus. Interpretation of incense in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman who sees frankincense in her dream is good news of the arrival of good news and good news and getting rid of worries, problems and sorrows, while seeing the fragrance of frankincense around the house, this vision indicates the will of God. Give her a male child. Interpretation of incense in a dream - YouTube Vision (incense) Dream Interpretation Program - YouTube

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a dead person from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a sick person. Interpreters believe that the vision carries many connotations that vary depending on the details of the dream and the viewerâ€™s feeling during the dream. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a sick person by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about a sick dead person? The illness of a dead person in a dream indicates his intense need for someone who calls for mercy and forgiveness and gives him charity. And he gives him her reward. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person being tired and having pain in his stomach may indicate that the deceased was negligent in his duties towards his family. If the dreamer sees the deceased suffering from his illness and crying from intense pain, then the dream leads to his bad condition in the afterlife due to the sins he committed in his life. What Is the interpretation of a dream about a sick dead person, Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin believes that the illness of a dead person portends evil and shows his many sins, so the dreamer should not abandon supplication for the dead person due to his urgent need for his supplication. If the dreamer sees a dead person suffering from head pain in the vision, this indicates that the mother The deceased is not satisfied with him and does not forgive him for his mistake against her. It is said that seeing the deceased with an injured throat indicates that he neglected his wifeâ€™s rights in this world, and the dream may also indicate that he was extravagant and wasted a lot of money on trivial things. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a waterfall in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: There are some visions that appear to many of us and have a different interpretation than their appearance to some other people, and from this vision, the vision of a waterfall in a dream is interpreted, explaining to you all the opinions of the different interpreters who dream about that vision. Interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin tells us that seeing a waterfall in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires that the dreamer sought to achieve in the past period. The waterfall in a dream also indicates good luck for the owner of this vision. The waterfall can be a symbol of improving financial conditions or getting rid of the dreamer's debts in the previous period. The waterfall in a dream also indicates success in the practical and professional life of the dreamer. If the dreamer sees a lot of waterfalls, it indicates the development of future plans that he seeks, and God willing, he will be able to achieve these plans. Interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream for a married woman Many dream interpreters argue that the appearance of a waterfall in a married woman's dream indicates the marital stability that this woman is currently experiencing. A waterfall in a married woman's dream indicates that this woman is pregnant and gives birth to children. If this lady suffers from problems and fears, then The waterfall indicates an approach to escape from these problems. Some dream interpreters believe that the waterfall in a dream indicates the wide life that this lady will enjoy. Interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream for a man Whoever thinks that he is swimming in a waterfall in a dream will soon recover from many diseases. Seeing a waterfall in a dream means that the owner of the dream has witnessed many renewed events in his life, and this renewal will be mostly positive. The man who jumps from the top of the waterfall shows that the goals he seeks to achieve are approaching. Imam al-Sadiq says that when the waterfall appears abundant in a man's dream, it indicates the physical and family stability in which this person currently lives. The waterfall is a sign of marriage to a single man. Interpretation of seeing a waterfall in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a waterfall in a dream is for a good and easy birth. Also, the dream of a woman carrying a waterfall is one of the auspicious visions that indicate goodness, comfort and means of life, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of rain falling in a waterfall Seeing rain falling in waterfalls indicates that the dreamer is very generous. This vision also shows that the dreamer brings blessings and life to everyone around him. It is also mentioned that this dreamer, his invitation, may Responded. Interpretation of a dream about looking at a waterfall Seeing a dreamer looking at a waterfall means sincere kindness and abundant life. This vision also indicates a change in professional life. He notices the good news of a big promotion at work. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a waterfall Seeing the dreamer as if he was swimming in a waterfall, tells him that fear and sadness have ended. This vision also shows the coming of contentment and goodness. It also indicates the achievement of the goals he seeks. It also indicates that the dreamer will establish a happy romantic relationship. Interpretation of a dream about jumping over a waterfall Seeing him jumping over a waterfall is good news for the dreamer to come to him and relax psychologically. It also indicates the disappearance of fears

title: Interpretation of a dream about cardamom

preview.html: Watercress is a radish-like plant that grows in soft soil on the edges of canals and has many benefits that benefit the body. Seeing them eating cardamom is a dream of many people and they are looking for its interpretation. Through this article, you will learn about the meanings of seeing watercress in a dream. Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretation of seeing watercress in a dream: Seeing cardamom in a dream is a bad sign, as it is a bad omen and there is no good in it, and this indicates that all the money in the possession of the dreamer was obtained by illegal means, but If the dream owner is a university student, this indicates that this student will rise to the top, achieve his grades and fulfill all his desires, and for a divorced woman, seeing watercress in a dream is evidence of the difficulties she has gone through. Interpretation of an unmarried girl seeing cardamom in a dream This indicates that she feels He was stressed and depressed and could not bear any more problems due to the many challenges he faced. Eating watercress in a dream is not good because it indicates concerns and problems with parents and everyone around you. An unmarried girl sees many bunches of watercress in a dream, who wants to get married and feels the need for a romantic relationship. Interpretation of seeing a married woman in a dream with cardamom. If a woman sees For a married woman, watercress in a dream indicates many problems between her and her husband and his family, and eating watercress is evidence of solving these problems and making them disappear as quickly as possible, if the person wants God. The dream is evidence of losing money and a lot of envy, so she must be careful of those around her. Interpretation of eating watercress in a dream Eating cardamom in a dream indicates the difficulties you face at this time, but do not despair, all of this will go away with the passage of time. Interpretation of buying watercress In a dream: Buying watercress in a dream is evidence of many disagreements and quarrels with your family and all those close to you. When you buy watercress in a dream, it means that you are not silent about injustice and tyranny. A pregnant woman eating watercress in a dream. Seeing a pregnant woman eating cardamom by herself in a dream indicates extreme exhaustion. What you are suffering from during this period. Interpretation of a man seeing cardamom in a dream: Watercress in a manâ€™s dream is a sign of the bad qualities that characterize the dreamer and the injustice that people around him suffer from because of green watercress in a manâ€™s dream is a warning of the problems that he will face in the future. The days of losing his money and buying cardamom in a dream is evidence of many problems in his personal life and with his family members. Seeing a married cardamom man in a dream. Seeing cardamom in a dream by a married man is a positive sign, indicating that a respectable man will provide him with good offspring and his wife may give birth to a male. Soon. Seeing a married man selling cardamom in a dream. Selling cardamom in a married manâ€™s dream is evidence of the financial hardship that the man is going through and many problems between him and his wife. In the end, we learned the interpretation of seeing cardamom in a dream and all the meanings of this dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a gun in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Our next article, which we present through an encyclopedia, is about the interpretation of a dream about a gun in a dream for a married woman. In any case, he may see this dream, and it is one of the disturbing visions that once the dreamer sees it, he will feel fear and anxiety, as it is one of the tools and means used in killing with bullets, and there is nothing. Those who are not afraid of it, as life represents the most precious things for a person, which makes him want to stay away from anything that could end this life. When this dream comes to a married woman, the interpretation is completely different from the vision of a man, human being, or other person for him, and the meaning of this dream depends on On the psychological state of the dreamer at the time of seeing him. The dream that we will present in detail in the following paragraphs through what has been reported by interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a gun in a dream for a married woman. Below we present the meanings of a married woman who sees a gun in a dream: Buying a gun indicates the security and stability that she experiences in her family life, which she derives from the strength and wisdom of her husband. The gunshot from her gun symbolizes the presence of imminent danger and she will get rid of it and live, thank God, soon. Shooting from the gun with smoke rising after that, and the sign was the suffering that ended in a speedy recovery by Godâ€™s will. This dream also symbolizes a woman who travels with her husband and leaves her upon his return soon and safely. Holding hands among a group of people shows the respect she has for those around her and what she will achieve in terms of a prestigious position and an excellent position at work. And if she sees that she is shooting one of her friends, then this dream is a warning message that she must be careful with this friend, as she may be pregnant. The dreamer's bad intentions. Someone gave me a gun in a dream. In the following points we explain the meanings of a married woman who sees that someone gave her a gun in a dream: Taking a gun from a dead person indicates disagreements between relatives and parents. To take a gun from someone and then shoot herself and kill herself, This indicates her intense thinking about the future and her anxiety about it, which is a form of weak faith in God. If someone gives a married woman in a dream a gun and she becomes afraid, this indicates a change in her condition from weakness to strength. While she takes the gun from a reassured and unafraid person, it symbolizes To the extent of her confidence and ability to manage the affairs of her home and family and make her husband happy. Thus, we have completed the inventory of all the interpretations of a married woman who sees a gun in a dream in all the circumstances in which this dream corresponds, according to what scholars mentioned in the interpretation of noble dreams, while no one has. He was able to understand the reason for these dreams in general, but the truth is that they are related to each other. It is often documented in people's reality and their lives, and it should be noted that these interpretations cannot be taken for granted, but they can be true or false. To interpret another dream, you can enter through the direct application. Interpretation of dreams.Critic1
